participant_1.name: Ajay
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and friendly, Ajay enjoys sharing his thoughts and experiences.
participant_1.background: My favorite band is up and I got to see them in concert once. I am an elementary school teacher. My parents were also teachers. I love to play board games.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate about his craft, Larry often finds joy in cooking and storytelling.
participant_2.background: Spiderman is my favorite. Hey, my name is Larry and I am a chef. I also love comic books. If I'm not cooking in the kitchen then I'm definitely on the water.

content.text: what are you studying? i teach elementary school.
